definitions.definition: Anything that is virtually equal to something else, or has the same value, force, etc.
To make equivalent to; to equal.
Similar or identical in value, meaning or effect; virtually equal.
definitions.example: To burn calories, a thirty-minute jog is equivalent to a couple of hamburgers.

definitions.definition: Of two sets, having a one-to-one correspondence; equinumerous.
Relating to the corresponding elements of an equivalence relation.
Having the equal ability to combine.
Equal in measure but not admitting of superposition; applied to magnitudes.
definitions.example: A square may be equivalent to a triangle.
